Reviews.Title: “I have never been treated so poorly in any hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Palentina2010
Reviews.Content: poorly ventilated smell own regulation air conditioning reception regulated means die cold heat receptionist speak english answer yes owner hotel beyond evil kindness virtues bathroom leaking noisy fix breakfast poor supposed 3 star hotel wifi service paying extortionate prices 15minute walk termini night recommend hotel return price stars justice services offered deal appears thank able sleep ive hotels rome ive ill treated

Reviews.Title: “Much Better than the reviews”
Reviews.Author: Romanintheruins
Reviews.Content: sister traveled rome time stayed hotel center 2 trip advisor review hotel set trip planner tried change hotel left thank goodness couldnt nicest seen told fellow travelers train bit jealous modern windows close traffic lots noise sound roudy coming home nonstop horns breeze tall windows rome atmosphere people pay fortune rustic booked cozy nicest people desk americans bus passes mapped stops day middle

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, near Termini station”
Reviews.Author: Schmilly
Reviews.Content: stayed via gate 1 travel value trip organizer arrived rome florence train walked minutes hotel newly modernized clean bit cares youre rome hang hotel close rome subway easy attractions breakfast waitress espresso automated machine doesnt add own latte
